title: Suzume No Tojimari
description: A touching novel adaptation of Makoto Shinkai’s film, following Suzume’s journey to close mysterious doors that unleash disasters across Japan.
author: Makoto Shinkai

title: How To Think Like Einstein
description: A guide to developing creative thinking and problem-solving skills inspired by Albert Einstein’s unique approach to science and life.
author: Scott Thorpe

title: Only Murder
description: A chilling thriller about a detective trapped in a small town where every clue points back to his own past.
author: Lisa Matthews

title: The Love Hypothesis
description: A rom-com novel about a young scientist navigating fake dating and unexpected love in academia.
author: Ali Hazelwood

title: It's a Funny Thing
description: A light-hearted exploration of humor and human nature through witty stories and real-life anecdotes.
author: James Corbin

title: The Nature Of Technology
description: An insightful analysis of how technology evolves and shapes society, exploring the logic behind invention and innovation.
author: W. Brian Arthur

title: Tomorrow Most Likely
description: A delightful children’s book that imagines all the wonderful things tomorrow might bring, encouraging curiosity and imagination.
author: Dave Eggers

title: Fundamentals Of Business
description: A comprehensive introduction to modern business concepts, including management, marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship.
author: Stephen J. Skripak

title: The Mind Of A Leader
description: An exploration of leadership inspired by the philosophies of ancient thinkers and modern psychology.
author: Rasmus Hougaard

title: The Business Of The Future
description: A visionary look at how science and technology are reshaping the business landscape of tomorrow.
author: Elena G. Meyer

title: Journey To The Stars
description: An imaginative children’s story about a young astronaut’s journey through the galaxy to discover friendship and courage.
author: Emily Carter

title: Green Thumb Poppy
description: A charming children’s book about a young gardener who learns to care for plants and people alike.
author: Harper Lane

title: I Can't Make This Up
description: A hilarious and honest memoir from comedian Kevin Hart, full of stories about resilience and laughter.
author: Kevin Hart

title: A Calling For Charlie Barnes
description: A darkly humorous story of one man’s life, his regrets, and the absurdity of chasing success.
author: Joshua Ferris

title: The Thing In The Snow
description: A surreal novel blending thriller and existential mystery set in an isolated research station buried in snow.
author: Sean Adams

title: Bloom Into You
description: A tender and emotional coming-of-age romance between two girls discovering love for the first time.
author: Nakatani Nio

title: The America Roommate Experiment
description: A romantic comedy about two writers sharing an apartment and discovering love in unexpected ways.
author: Elena Armas

title: Technically Yours
description: A tech-driven love story about two software engineers navigating code, deadlines, and desire.
author: Denise Williams

title: The Science Of Science
description: An exploration of the data-driven patterns behind how science itself progresses and evolves.
author: Dashun Wang

title: This New Ocean
description: A sweeping chronicle of humanity’s ventures into space, blending science, history, and vision.
author: William E. Burrows

title: How AI Ate The World
description: A deep dive into how artificial intelligence transformed industries, culture, and our understanding of humanity.
author: Sam Altier

title: The Worlds I See
description: An inspiring memoir and vision of AI’s potential by a leading scientist shaping the future of technology.
author: Fei-Fei Li

title: The Girls In The Cabin
description: A psychological thriller about four friends trapped in a remote cabin with a killer among them.
author: Megan Brooks

title: The Girls They Fear
description: A gripping thriller following a journalist uncovering a string of murders linked to a secret society.
author: Rebecca Barrow
